wikipedia_page.main: Bernard Johnson (1 December 1868 - 16 May 1935) FRCO was an organist and composer based in Nottingham. He was appointed City Organist for Nottingham in 1910.

response: *Bernard Johnson 1904–1909 (afterwards organist of Albert Hall, Nottingham)
The current organ was installed in 1926-27 by Brindley & Foster and was opened by Bernard Johnson on 30 January 1927.
